component.name: org.jboss.seam.ui.graphicImage.TransformImageSize
component.description: Nested in a s:graphicImage. Transform an image by altering the size

property.name: maintainRatio
property.description: If true, don't alter the ratio of the image. In this case only height or width should be specificed.

property.name: width
property.description: The new width of the image

property.name: height
property.description: The new height of the image

property.name: factor
property.description: Change the size of the image by a fraction. If factor is specified, height, width and maintainRatio should not be specified
